rows.name: Professional Experience and Knowledge
cells: At least 7 years of relevant Business Analysis experience (for Career Path transfers from BA) or 2+ years relevant industry consultancy experience.
At least 2 years at Analyst grade or 4+ year relevant industry consulting experience.
At least 3 years of experience at Consultant grade or 7+ years relevant industry consultancy experience.
At least 3 years of experience at Senior Consultant grade or 10+ years relevant industry consultancy experience, or 10-15+ years relevant industry experience and consulting experience combination.
At least 4 years of experience at Principal grade or 15+ years relevant industry consultancy experience, or 15-20+ years relevant industry experience and consulting experience combination.

rows.name: Software Process Knowledge
cells: Expected to understand a defined software process and to be able to understand and work to a consultancy assignment management framework.
Expected to understand a defined software process and have a good understanding of consultancy assignment management processes and consultancy deliverables.
Expected to understand a defined software process and have a excellent understanding of consultancy assignment management processes and consultancy deliverables across a broad range of assignments.
Expected to understand a defined software process and have a excellent understanding of consultancy assignment management processes and consultancy deliverables across a broad range of assignments.
Expected to understand a defined software process and have a excellent understanding of consultancy assignment management processes and consultancy deliverables across a broad range of assignments.

rows.name: Business Domain Knowledge
cells: Has a broad conceptual understanding of the relevant industry sector and 1-2 areas of growing specialization. Can assist business domain experts (SMEs) on required business process, assessment, and operating model work.

Has a broad understanding of the relevant industry sector and 1-2 areas of specialist knowledge. Can deputise for business domain experts (SMEs) on required business process, assessment, and operating model work.
Has a strong understanding of the relevant industry sector and deep specialization in 1-2 areas. Contributes as a SME in assignments which require specialization.
Has an excellent understanding of the relevant industry sector and is known as a deep SME/thought leader and in 1-2 areas. Lead/co-lead SME in assignments in which require specialization.

Has an excellent and broad understanding of the relevant industry sector and is known as a deep SME and thought leader and in 1-2 areas. Lead SME in substantial assignments in which require deep specialization.

rows.name: Design and Documentation Skills and IP skills
cells:
Reads and understands project documentation.

Can contribute to the production of high quality consultancy deliverables, or produce individual chapters, with minimal supervision. Contributes to IP development.

Reads and understands project documentation.

Can produce high quality consultancy deliverables, tailored to the individual assignment. Contributes to IP development.

Reads and understands project documentation.

Will consistently product high quality consultancy deliverables, tailored to the individual assignment, which are well received by the client. Contributes or leads IP development. Contributes to marketing content.

When required, will product high quality consultancy deliverables, tailored to the individual assignment, which are well received by the client. Leads/co-leads IP development. Regularly produces marketing content.
Proposes, sponsors and leads development of significant IP. Regularly produces marketing content of all types. If required, can produce top quality consultancy deliverables.

rows.name: Job Titles
cells: Business Consultant

Senior Business Consultant;

Client Engagement Manager

Principal Business Consultant;

Senior Client Engagement Manager

Director, Business Consultancy;

Director, Client Engagement;

Managing Principal, Business Consultancy

Senior Director, Business Consultancy;

Senior Director, Client Engagement

rows.name: Recruitment and Networking
cells: Expected to grow a network of industry professionals. Recommends quality consultancy staff and has contacts in the industry.
Has a network of industry professionals. Recommends quality consultancy staff and has contacts in the industry.
Has a wide network of senior industry professionals and is well known to a number of clients/potential clients. Uses network to seek opportunities, regularly recommends quality consulting staff.
Has a wide network of senior industry professionals and is well known to a number of clients/potential clients. Uses network to seek opportunities, regularly recommends quality consulting staff.
Has a wide network of ED, MD and C level industry professionals and is well known to a number of clients/potential clients. Regularly leverages network for sales and recruitment opportunities.

rows.name: Roles Played on a Project
cells: Carries out detailed analysis and documentation work required for consulting assignments. This could include, but is not limited to, business processes, business architecture, “as is” analysis; stakeholders interviews.
Carries out client facing analysis and documentation work and supervises  Analysts in work required for consulting assignments. Contributes to recommendation formulation.

Faces off to key client contacts & SME’s. Actively manages client relationships. Has overall responsibility for a smaller assignment/a key area of a larger assignment. Manages and flexes the assignment process and ensures high quality deliverable are produced. Builds key stakeholder relationships & helps synthesize recommendations.

Primary face off to assignment sponsors and senior client staff. Actively manages client relationships. Leads all but the largest consultancy assignments. Supports sales & farms opportunities. Mentors staff.

Faces off to assignment sponsors and Steering Committees. Builds senior client relationships. Leads and develops consulting practice(s) and large assignments. Owns assignment portfolio. Identifies upcoming trends, supports sales & farms opportunities. Mentors staff.

rows.name: Reliability and Independence
cells: Expected to be able to understand the overall objectives and required deliverables of an assignment and carry out assigned analysis and documentation work with some guidance and supervision.
Understand the overall objectives and required deliverables of an assignment. Supervises or carries out analysis and documentation work to set timescales and quality standards with some guidance.
Manages assignment/assignment area with minimal supervision and consistently good results. Entrusted with key customer relationships.
Works independently but ensures salient information is communicated to Practice Management/Consulting Heads. Builds key customer relationships.
Works independently but ensures salient information is communicated to Consulting Heads.

rows.name: Quality
cells: Must produce high quality consulting deliverables that achieve the explicit and implicit objectives of the assignment.
Assists in the design & tailoring of consulting deliverables. Produces high quality deliverables that achieve the explicit and implicit objectives of the assignment.
Produces high quality deliverables that achieve the explicit and implicit objectives of the assignment, are well received by the client and are tailored to achieve their purpose.
Ensures that all work on assignment is carried out to meet or exceed client quality expectations.

Ensures that all work on assignment is carried out to meet or exceed client quality expectations. Ensures IP development, marketing content, sales support, staff & career management, and other deliverables of the practice area are all produced to high quality.

rows.name: Customer Relations
cells: Expected to participate in meetings/phone conferences; be involved in customer workshops and presentations; collect data and information under supervision; present results under supervision; visit customers without supervision.

Expected to participate in meetings/phone conferences; be involved in customer workshops and presentations; collect data and information under supervision; present results under supervision; visit customers without supervision.

Expected to participate in meetings/phone conferences; be involved in customer workshops and presentations; collect data and information without supervision; present results without supervision; visit customers without supervision.

Expected to participate actively in meetings/phone conferences with clients; collect requirements, data and information; create presentations without supervision; able to present and work with clients to meet overall goals.

Expected organize and lead meetings/phone conferences with clients; collect requirements, data and information; create presentations and supervise staff with this; able to present and work with clients to meet overall goals.

rows.name: English Language Ability
cells: B2
C1
C1
C2
C2
